ccre.net.ServerSocket

    ccre.net  

    • Uses of ServerSocket in ccre.net

      Methods in ccre.net that return ServerSocket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ServerSocket Network.bind(int port)
      Listen on the specified port, and return a ServerSocket representing the connection.
      ServerSocket NetworkProvider.openServer(int port)
      Open a server socket to listen on the specified port.
